title: HoP 379 - Lyndal Roper on Luther
itunes:title: HoP 379 - Lyndal Roper on Luther
description: How radical was Luther? We find out from Lyndal Roper, who also discusses Luther and the Peasants' War, sexuality, anti-semitism, and the visual arts.
